game_description: Young dragon returned to claim his mother's stolen gold.
review_1: I was standing in place shooting at colored boulders to protect a little dragon from this giant lady who was throwing rocks in our direction. I'm not sure how scoring works or why some rocks fell and others grew. I never beat the giant. A tutorial is definitely needed.
review_2: The only thing you do in this game is shoot balls at a giant old lady. I’m not joking. And she will witewy hit da gwitty if she kills Karga. It’s so stupid, it’s funny. You’ll have a bit of entertainment for a minute or two, then it’s over. I don’t really recommend this game.
review_3: Really enjoyed this promising shooter game...the settings with the animals on looking is awesome. ..looking forward to playing more , it's a real comfortable play.
review_4: Looking good so far I like the 3d models, let's get some movement in combat and some faster shooting maybe? Can't wait for an update happy to be here the whole process
